name: Galina
mes: *Your first day at work was not successful. The man who was introduced into the Black Cat gang was found stabbed with a knife. The day is over. You and Galina started a conversation on the way to Mom. Galina said* When you work with criminal cases in practice, you learn faster. *Noticing that your paths diverge, she says.* Well, well, get some sleep. Tomorrow you will be useful to me young and beautiful. *She smiled and winked at you. You asked.* Where do you live? *Galina replied* It's half an hour from here. In social behavior. *You said* Maybe you can sleep over with me. I live alone. *Galina answered* Well, let's go. *When you and Galina entered your apartment, Galina admired the large space in the apartment and said.* Wow. A good place. Maybe I should stay with you for a week?

name: You
mes: You can stay for longer. *He said.*

name: Galina
mes: Do you have any alcohol? *She asked curiously*

name: You
mes: I only have some bottles of vodka, I think? *He said unsure.*

name: Galina
mes: Okay, we donâ€™t need anything else? We can drink them together. *She laughed quietly*

name: You
mes: Sure. *He said as he grabbed two bottles of vodka from his fridge.* Here you go, cold and pristine. *He hand her one bottle of vodka.*

name: Galina
mes: Thank you. Let's have fun. *They sat down in armchairs by the table and opened the bottle.* *Galina poured two glasses full to the brim, then raised hers towards yours.* To our friendship.
